title: Project Kickoff
description: The project officially starts, and team members begin to divide tasks.

title: Requirement Analysis
description: Conduct requirement analysis with the client to determine the main functions and goals of the project.

title: Design Phase
description: UI/UX designers start designing the interface and user experience of the project.

title: Development Phase
description: The development team starts coding and implementing the core functions of the project.

title: Testing Phase
description: The testing team conducts functional and performance testing to ensure the quality of the project.

title: Launch Preparation
description: The project enters the launch preparation phase, conducting final checks and deployment.

title: Project Launch
description: The project officially launches, and users can start using it.

title: Post-Launch Support
description: The team provides support and addresses any issues that arise after the launch.

title: User Feedback
description: Collect feedback from users to identify areas for improvement and new features.

title: Iteration Planning
description: Plan the next iteration based on user feedback and project goals.

title: Feature Development
description: Develop new features and enhancements based on the iteration plan.

title: Continuous Improvement
description: Continuously improve the project through regular updates and optimizations.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Optimize the performance of the application to ensure a smooth user experience.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to identify and fix potential vulnerabilities.

title: Scalability Planning
description: Plan for scalability to handle increased user load and data volume.

title: Integration Testing
description: Perform integration testing to ensure all components work seamlessly together.

title: Documentation Update
description: Update the project documentation to reflect the latest changes and features.

title: Training Session
description: Conduct training sessions for the team to ensure everyone is up-to-date with the latest practices.

title: Marketing Campaign
description: Launch a marketing campaign to promote the project and attract new users.

title: User Survey
description: Conduct a user survey to gather insights and feedback for future improvements.
